nodes.text: The Noonian system was a star system located within the Noonian sector in the Outer Rim Territories which contained the planet Noonar.

During the Galactic Civil War, the system was under the rule of Governor Trophan Thanis and was the site of several food processing centers of Nebula Consumables. Since Nebula Consumables supplied the Imperial Army, Rebel privateers attacked the shipping lanes and managed to steal 25% of all shipments, which caused Thanis to request reinforcements from the neighboring Halthor sector.
